name: Orunodoi Scheme
description: Financial assistance of ₹1,250/month to economically weaker families in Assam.

documents.name: Aadhaar Card
documents.description: A unique 12-digit identification number issued by UIDAI.

documents.name: Bank Passbook
documents.description: First page of your bank account passbook showing account number and IFSC code.

documents.name: Income Certificate
documents.description: Certificate from Circle Officer proving annual family income is below ₹2 Lakh.

documents.name: Residential Proof
documents.description: Proof that you are a permanent resident of Assam (e.g., Voter ID, Domicile Certificate).

steps: Visit your nearest Deputy Commissioner's Office or a designated camp.
Fill the Orunodoi application form (available at the office or camp).
Attach self-attested copies of all required documents.
Submit the form and collect the acknowledgement slip.
Wait for verification. The status will be updated via SMS.

name: Pragyan Bharati Scheme
description: Provides free textbooks and uniforms to students in government and provincialised schools in Assam.

documents.name: School Enrollment Certificate
documents.description: Certificate from the school confirming the student's enrollment.

documents.name: Aadhaar Card
documents.description: Student's Aadhaar card for identity verification.

steps: Ensure you are enrolled in a government or provincialised school in Assam.
No separate application is needed. The school administration distributes materials.
Collect textbooks and uniforms from your school at the start of the academic year.

name: Kanyashree Prakalpa (West Bengal)
description: Annual scholarship for girls aged 13-18 and one-time grant for higher education.

documents.name: School ID Card
documents.description: Proof of enrollment in a recognized institution.

documents.name: Income Certificate
documents.description: Family income certificate from competent authority.

steps: Visit the official Kanyashree portal: https://wbkanyashree.gov.in
Register with your school's help through the 'Applicant Corner'.
Fill in personal, educational, and bank details.
Submit and track application status online.

name: Arundhati Gold Scheme
description: Provides 1 Tola (10 grams) of gold to brides from economically weaker sections in Assam.

documents.name: Special Marriage Registration Certificate
documents.description: Marriage must be registered under the Special Marriage Act.

documents.name: Income Certificate
documents.description: Family income certificate of the bride's family.

steps: Register your marriage under the Special Marriage Act at the local registrar's office.
Visit the DC Office or apply online at the official Assam government portal.
Submit the application with all required documents.
After verification, receive the gold voucher.
Redeem the voucher at an authorized jeweler.
